title.narrative: 2014 Management Project - YouthStart Business Case Analysis

description.narrative: This project will take a "deep dive" financial analysis of the cost and revenue drivers in 3 YouthStart FSPs to understand profitability time horizons of: a) YouthStart 18 - 24 year old savers and borrowers b) youth in those FSPs taking mass market products and c) YouthStart or youth using alternate delivery channels such as POS and mobile financial services. This quantitative analysis will be put in context of the market, institutional and segment drivers laid out in the CGAP youth savings business case framework. An internal report will be produced and adapted for external dissemination by UNCDF YouthStart.

participating-org.narrative: Frankfurt School of Finance & Management gemeinnutzige GmbH
